Title: Provides for the sharing of revenue from gaming devices located within the counties of Oneida and Madison
Summary: Provides for the sharing of thirty percent of revenue from gaming devices located within the county of Oneida; provides for the sharing of twenty-five percent of revenue from gaming devices located within the county of Madison.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-h, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the sharing of revenue from gaming devices located within the counties of Oneida and Madison
